thread.title: InvisibleSolutions and Workbooks Jointly Debut New Cloud Based Application – Workbooks Exchange Synch Service
thread.title_full: InvisibleSolutions and Workbooks Jointly Debut New Cloud Based Application – Workbooks Exchange Synch Service

author: admin
title: InvisibleSolutions and Workbooks Jointly Debut New Cloud Based Application – Workbooks Exchange Synch Service
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 10:23 AM   InvisibleSolutions 
MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- InvisibleSolutions introduces the launch of Workbooks Exchange Synch Service (WESS). Co-developed by Workbooks and InvisibleSolutions, WESS builds on the company’s current ServerSide Sync application by offering a cloud based solution that provides the same functionality without the hassle of installation. “Customer satisfaction is of the utmost importance to us and Workbooks Exchange Synch Service allows us to continue building on our stellar reputation and take things to the next level by offering customers the seamless integration they need, now with the simplicity that comes with implementing a cloud solution.” - John Cheney, CEO of Workbooks. 
This new technology integrates Exchange with Workbooks CRM and will support contacts, tasks, e-mails and calendar items. Extended features will also be offered in a later release that include support of recurrent meetings, attendees tracking, email alerts about synch summary and issues, and a conflict resolution UI. 
The solution has been fully tested and is currently being rolled-out to a select group of customers through a Beta program. Roll-out to the entire user base is scheduled for mid-November. “We are proud to continue partnering with Workbooks to offer solutions that are intuitive and easy for customers. Our integration provides users with a single place to manage ALL of a client’s CRM data within Outlook – now with all the benefits that come with delivering this via a cloud solution.” - Vlad Voskresensky, CEO, InvisibleSolutions 
About InvisibleSolutions: 
InvisibleSolutions is a technology provider of tools engineered to increase user adoption and ROI of enterprise applications by seamlessly integrating them into the way business people work every day. These tools enable users to work with their customer and corporate information, without leaving their favorite communication applications – Office 365 and Gmail. For more information, contact Jeff Krider at jeff.krider@invisiblesolutions.com or visit our website at www.invisiblesolutions.com . 
About Workbooks.com: 
Workbooks.com delivers world-class CRM and business applications to the mid-market, at an affordable price and with functionality that transforms business. Unlike traditional CRM solutions, Workbooks.com extends beyond sales, marketing and customer support to include order management, order fulfilment, invoicing and supplier management. This business functionality is delivered out-of-the-box at a price which is typically 50-70% less than enterprise solutions such as Salesforce, Microsoft Dynamics and Netsuite. For more information visit www.workbooks.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151022006333/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
